name: OxfordSaudia Flight Academy
about: OxfordSaudia Flight Academy, located at King Fahd International Airport in Dammam, Saudi Arabia, is a globally recognized institution in aviation training. Established in 2021 through a partnership between the Saudi National Center for Aviation and Oxford Academy, it leverages over 75 years of aviation expertise. The academy offers comprehensive training programs, including commercial pilot licenses, diploma programs in airport operations and travel tourism, and employment-leading training. Equipped with modern aircraft, full-motion flight simulators, and experienced instructors, OxfordSaudia ensures students meet the highest safety and competency standards set by the Saudi General Authority of Civil Aviation. The academy aims to meet the demand for civil pilots in the Saudi and Middle East markets, providing graduates with the skills and experience necessary to succeed in the aviation industry.
